title: I have a Pixel 3a XL which keeps cutting audio on calls for a few seconds. How do I resolve this?
content:
When on phone calls the audio regularly cuts out for  a few seconds.  This has happened since I bought the phone.
I have checked that I have the latest version of Android.
I have turned off "Hey Google"
I have searched  this forum for further advice, but have been able to find any.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
